summary: Just a slight alteration to get the quest going.
descriptionHtml:
Being the semi-honest person that I am, when someone tells me that I can't just go in somewhere and disturb someone's meeting, I usually say "okay" and walk away. So I found it a bit unsettling that I had to break into the inner sanctum of the Temple of Dibella to start the Heart of Dibella quest. Since I definitely wasn't going to help Degaine steal a statue, and Senna basically said "no entry," I decided to add a little "divine intervention."

So Senna forbids you to enter the inner sanctum, but allows you to use the Shrine of Dibella. So I made the shrine give you a little incentive to go in anyway. When you use the shrine, you'll get a notice saying that you're compelled to enter the sanctum. Once you do and agree to do the quest, the shrine will stop "compelling" you to enter.

Unfortunately, I can't do much more than that. With a little help, I'd like to add a little extra incentive like the shrine casting a spell that cuts your stamina in half or something until you agree to do the quest. Until then, this is the best I can do.

Enjoy.
author: CaptainRC
